turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to buy coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the iced blonde cinnamon cloud macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk and can you use stevia?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like your beverage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a grande iced blonde cinnamon cloud machiatto with coconut milk and stevia, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up on the Starbucks off telegraph Canyon in Chula Vista.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks off telegraph canyon.
